                               java.lang.String zipCode,
                               java.lang.String email,
                               java.lang.String phoneNumber)
        This method creates a new member object in the member arrayList and adds them to the data file
        Parameters:
        firstName - The member's first name
        lastName - The member's last name
        streetAddress - Member's street address
        city - Member's city
        state - Member's state
        zipCode - Member's zip code
        email - Member's email
        phoneNumber - Member's phone number
        Returns:
        Member object of newly created member
